hero.title: Qabeenya Dhokfame Itoophiyaa Argadhaa
hero.subtitle: Haro Dandi waliin simachuu Itoophiyaa dhugaa, bakka miidhagaa ajaa'iba qabu, fi imala aadaa hin dagatamne qooddadhaa
home.section.welcome: Gara Haro Dandi Baga Nagaan Dhuftan
home.section.subtitle: Ogummaa simachuu hawaasa irratti hundaa'e
hotels.title: Mana Keessummaa fi Lodges
hotels.subtitle: Mijataa fi soorata bakka ajaa'ibaa keessatti qooddadhaa
hotels.empty: Yeroo ammaa manni keessummaa hin jiru.
hotels.cta.title: Qubsuma Keessan Qabachuuf Qophii Dha?
hotels.cta.subtitle: Qubsuma fi paakeejii addaa argachuuf har'a nu quunnamaa
tours.title: Tajaajila Daawwannoo
tours.subtitle: Muuxannoo imala hin dagatamne Itoophiyaa keessatti argadhaa
tours.cta.title: Daawwannaaf Qophii Dha?
tours.cta.subtitle: Imala Itoophiyaa keessan muddhaa ta'e karoorfachuuf har'a nu quunnamaa
contact.title: Nu Quunnamaa
contact.subtitle: Isin dhaga'uun nuuf gammachuu qaba. Har'a nu quunnamaa.
contact.form.title: Ergaa Nuu Ergaa
contact.form.subject: Mata Duree
contact.form.placeholder.subject: Akkamitti isin gargaaruu dandeenya?
contact.form.placeholder.message: Waa'ee gaafii keessanii caalaatti nuuf himaa...
contact.form.error: Ergaa erguu hin milkoofne. Maaloo irra deebi'ii yaaladhaa.
gallery.title: Galarii
gallery.subtitle: Kuufama yeroo fi bakka bareedaa keenyaa qoradhaa
home.experience.title: Simachuu Itoophiyaa faayidaa addaa waliin qooddadhaa
home.experience.description: Kuufama filatamaa mana keessummaa Itoophiyaa gaarii ta'een soorata keessa jiraadhaa fi keessumtoota keenyaaf faayidaa addaa argadhaa.
home.discover.title: Imala itti aanu keessaniif kakaasaa haaraa argadhaa
home.discover.description: Bakka bareedduu yookaan muuxannoo gammachisaa ta'ee, fedhii imala keessan ibsaa fi sababoota haaraa imalachuu fi qorachuuf argadhaa.
home.community.title: Hawaasa fedhii waloo qabu keessatti hirmaachaa
home.community.description: Toora interneetii irratti yookaan taateewwan keenyaa irratti imaltota biroo waliin wal qunnamaa fi hiriyummaa yeroo dheeraa daangaa darbee uumaa.
home.benefits.title: Faayidaa Miseensaa
home.benefits.hotels.title: Faayidaa Mana Keessummaa
home.benefits.hotels.desc: Mana keessummaa michuu keessatti fooyya'iinsa, yeroo gad bahuu duubatti harkifame fi faayidaa biroo argadhaa
home.benefits.globalCommunity.title: Hawaasa Addunyaa
home.benefits.globalCommunity.desc: Toora interneetii irratti taateewwan addaa 1000 ol irratti imaltota biroo waliin wal argaa
home.benefits.events.title: Taateewwan 800 Ol
home.benefits.events.desc: Taateewwan keenya addaa addunyaa guutuutti miseensota biroo waliin wal argaa
home.benefits.inspiration.title: Kakaasaa Imala Guyyaa Guyyaa
home.benefits.inspiration.desc: Imala itti aanu keessaniif kakaasaa kennan guyyaa guyyaan haaraa
home.benefits.privileges.title: Mirga Imala
home.benefits.privileges.desc: Birannoolee addaa fi fooyya'iinsa barandii imala amanamoo irraa argadhaa
home.benefits.deals.title: Birannoo Mana Keessummaa
home.benefits.deals.desc: Birannoo mana keessummaa gaarii ta'e argadhaa fi birannoo addaa keenyaan mana keessummaa daawwadhaa
home.inspiration.title: Kakaasaa imala guyyaa guyyaa
home.inspiration.places.title: Bakkeewwan Addaa Qorachuuf
home.inspiration.places.desc: Karaalee addaa seenaa badhaadhina Itoophiyaa argachuuf
home.inspiration.luxury.title: Mana Keessummaa Soorata Imala Gaarii Ta'e
home.inspiration.luxury.desc: Simachuu sadarkaa addunyaa Itoophiyaa keessatti qooddadhaa
home.inspiration.destinations.title: Bakki Imala Itoophiyaa Olaanaa
home.inspiration.destinations.desc: Bakki imaltoonni addunyaa hubannoo guddaa qaban itti deeman
home.cta.title: Hawaasa imaltota soorata
home.cta.description: Haro Dandi hawaasa amanamaa imaltota soorata ammayyaa ti. Kakaasaa argadhaa, imala addaa qabaadhaa, fi miseensota yaada walfakkaataa qaban waliin wal qunnamaa.
